title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: A comprehensive specialization covering neural networks, convolutional networks, recurrent networks, and more. Taught by Andrew Ng.

title: Natural Language Processing Specialization
description: Covers NLP techniques like tokenization, embeddings, transformers, and sequence models. Taught by experts from deeplearning.ai.

title: Machine Learning
description: A foundational course on machine learning algorithms, taught by Andrew Ng. Covers supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.

title: Practical Deep Learning for Coders
description: A practical, code-first approach to deep learning using PyTorch. Covers image classification, NLP, and more.

title: Hugging Face Transformer Courses
description: Various courses and tutorials on using the Hugging Face Transformers library for NLP tasks.

title: Computer Vision Nanodegree
description: A comprehensive program covering computer vision fundamentals, object detection, image segmentation, and more.

title: Time Series Analysis with Python
description: Covers time series analysis techniques, including forecasting models like ARIMA and Prophet.

title: Advanced Machine Learning Specialization
platform: National Research University Higher School of Economics (Coursera)
description: Covers advanced ML topics like Bayesian methods, deep learning, and reinforcement learning.

title: Building Scalable Distributed Machine Learning Pipelines with TensorFlow Extended
description: Learn how to build and deploy robust ML pipelines using TensorFlow Extended (TFX).

title: Introduction to Generative AI Studio
description: Learn the basics of Generative AI and how to use Google's Generative AI Studio.

title: Natural Language Processing In 5 Minutes | What Is NLP And How Does It Work? | Simplilearn
description: Free tutorial on Natural Language Processing (NLP)

title: How Large Language Models Work
description: Free tutorial on Large Language Models (LLMs)

title: Deep Learning | What is Deep Learning? | Deep Learning Tutorial For Beginners | 2023 | Simplilearn
